name: service-search-api
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.lint:v1: speccy lint -s openapi-tags -s operation-tags -s -s path-keys-no-trailing-slash specification/service-search-api.yaml --skip default-and-example-are-redundant
scripts.lint:v2: speccy lint -s openapi-tags -s operation-tags -s -s path-keys-no-trailing-slash specification/service-search-api_v2.yaml --skip default-and-example-are-redundant
scripts.lint: npm run lint:v1 && npm run lint:v2
scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/service-search-api.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/service-search-api.json

author: NHS Digital
